FuncDef:
The interval command sets the interval at which ICMP Ping test packets are sent.
The undo interval command restores the default interval. The interval command sets the interval at which ICMP Ping test packets are sent. The undo interval command restores the default interval. By default, the interval is 4 seconds.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the interval at which test packets are sent, in seconds.
The value is an integer that ranges from 1 to 60, in seconds.

ExtraInfo: The probe-count command sets the number of probes to be sent for an NQA test instance. Based on statistics about these probes, you can evaluate network quality. To set the interval at which test packets are sent in each probe, run the interval command.
